frameworks.name: BRSR (Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting)
frameworks.description: Mandatory ESG disclosure framework issued by SEBI for top 1000 listed companies in India, covering environmental, social, and governance aspects.

frameworks.name: SASB (Sustainability Accounting Standards Board)
frameworks.description: Framework focused on financially material ESG factors by sector. Common in the US; often referenced globally for investor communications.

frameworks.name: TCFD (Task Force on Climate-related Financial Disclosures)
frameworks.description: Global climate-risk disclosure framework focused on financial risks and opportunities associated with climate change. Mandatory in some regions.

frameworks.name: GRI (Global Reporting Initiative)
metricsExamples: Water discharged by quality and destination
frameworks.description: Most widely used global standard for sustainability and ESG reporting. Designed for all sectors and organization sizes with broad stakeholder emphasis.

frameworks.name: ESRS (European Sustainability Reporting Standards)
frameworks.description: EU-mandated reporting under CSRD with detailed topical & cross-cutting ESG standards. Applies to large EU companies and value chain partners.
